@Test public void testTrigamma(){
  double eps=1e-8;
  double[] data={1e-4,1.0000000164469368793e8,1e-3,1.0000016425331958690e6,1e-2,10001.621213528313220,1e-1,101.43329915079275882,1,1.6449340668482264365,2,0.64493406684822643647,3,0.39493406684822643647,4,0.28382295573711532536,5,0.22132295573711532536,10,0.10516633568168574612,20,0.051270822935203119832,50,0.020201333226697125806,100,0.010050166663333571395};
  for (int i=data.length - 2; i >= 0; i-=2) {
    Assert.assertEquals(String.format("trigamma %.0f",data[i]),data[i + 1],Gamma.trigamma(data[i]),eps);
  }
}
